oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Various Christmas promos - Biff Collie - Jackson Brothers
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Recording of Christmas promos with Johnny Cash (performer), Patty Loveless (performer), Roy Clark (performer), Charlie Daniels (performer), Barbara Mandrell (performer), Willie Nelson (performer), Harold Reid (performer), Bill Anderson (performer), Carl Perkins (performer), Eddy Arnold (performer), and Grandpa Jones (performer), with host Biff Collie, sponsored by Jackson Brothers Automotive.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Biff Collie introduces Johnny Cash -- Johnny Cash talks about his Christmas mornings as a child -- Cash talks about listening to Christmas carols on the radio -- Biff Collie signs off -- Biff Collie introduces Patty Loveless -- Loveless talks about her Christmas mornings as a child and remembering the family Christmas tree, and her favorite Christmas song being Silent Night -- Biff Collie signs off -- Collie introduces Roy Clark -- Clark talks about Christmas morning when he was 14 years old, and receiving a guitar -- Collie signs off -- Collie introduces Cheryl and Sharon Buck -- the Buck sisters talk about their Christmas mornings as children -- Biff Collie signs off -- Collie introduces Charlie Daniels -- Daniels talks about his family taking Christmas very seriously and being festive in the holiday season -- Collie signs off -- Collie introduces Barbara Mandrell -- Mandrell talks about going to Colorado every Christmas with her family -- Collie signs off -- Collie introduces Willie Nelson -- Nelson wishes a Merry Christmas and talks about Christmas as a child -- Collie signs off -- Collie introduces Harold Reid -- Reid talks about Christmas as a child -- Collie signs off -- Collie introduction -- Collie signs off -- Collie introduces Bill Anderson -- Anderson talks about really enjoying Christmas since his son was born 8 years ago -- Collie signs off -- Collie introduces Carl Perkins -- Perkins talks about Christmas as a child -- Collie signs off -- Collie introduces Eddy Arnold -- Arnold talks about Christmas morning as a child -- Collie signs off -- Collie introduces Grandpa Jones -- Jones talks about Christmas morning as a child
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Collie, Biff; Cash, Johnny, 1932-2003; Loveless, Patty; Clark, Roy, 1933-; Daniels, Charlie, 1936-; Mandrell, Barbara, 1948-; Nelson, Willie, 1933-; Reid, Harold, 1939-; Anderson, Bill, 1937-; Perkins, Carl, 1932-1998; Arnold, Eddy, 1918-2008; Jones, Grandpa, 1913-1998;
